comments: EASY A THERE IS NOT EXAMS AT ALL YOU ONLY HAVE TO DO THE HWS AND DO THE PROJECT
The best psy prof ever had

He did raise my interest in the subject but at times I found class to be a bit dragging and unclear. Even though I attended every class and did all the reading with dedication I did not think his grading was fair. I took his class in the winter session which proved to be intense. There was a quiz every class which counted as 50% of your grade and a

He\'s really cool. Keeps the class interesting. I just had a 3-week winter session (4hrs M-Th) with him and I never fell asleep. He uses videos, radio exerpts, news clippings and the material is pretty current. Don\'t be fooled though, you have to put in the work - read & score well on quizzes/exams. He counts attendance and curves accordingly.

An excellent teacher, highly recomended. He treats his students with great respect, always has time for them and is interesting and engaging. Not overly difficult, as long as you do the work you should get a good grade.
